# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="92979-102">Outlook on the web で言語、日付と時刻の形式、またはタイムゾーンを変更する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="92979-103">ページの上部にある [</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="92979-104">**設定** > **すべての Outlook 設定を表示**します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="92979-105">[**一般的な** > **言語と時刻**] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="92979-106">使用する言語を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="92979-107">**[保存]** を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="92979-108">詳細については、「 [web 上の Outlook でタイムゾーンおよび言語設定を変更](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273)する」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="92979-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
